home.title: What will you accomplish with WaIA today?
home.placeholder: Describe a task and let AI handle the rest

calendarPrepNotes.title: Calendar Prep Notes
calendarPrepNotes.description: Review tomorrow's meetings and draft a prep notes doc.
calendarPrepNotes.prompt: Check my Google Calendar for tomorrow's meetings and draft preparation notes in a new Google Doc.

inboxPromoCleanup.title: Inbox Promo Cleanup
inboxPromoCleanup.description: Clear promotional emails from the last 24 hours.
inboxPromoCleanup.prompt: Go to my Gmail inbox and delete all promotional emails from the last 24 hours.

competitorPricingDeck.title: Competitor Pricing Deck
competitorPricingDeck.description: Analyze competitor pricing and draft a slide with recommendations.
competitorPricingDeck.prompt: Pull pricing and features from these 5 competitor sites [list URLs], save to a CSV, analyze our pricing gaps, and draft a recommendation slide in Google Slides for Monday's meeting.

notionApiAudit.title: Notion API Audit
notionApiAudit.description: Scan a Notion wiki for old API mentions with direct links.
notionApiAudit.prompt: Read through this Notion wiki at [URL] and find all mentions of the old API, listing them with page links.

stagingVsProdVisual.title: Staging vs Prod Visual Check
stagingVsProdVisual.description: Compare staging and production visuals with screenshots.
stagingVsProdVisual.prompt: Compare my staging site at [URL] to production at [URL] and screenshot any visual differences.

prodBrokenLinks.title: Production Broken Links
prodBrokenLinks.description: Check my website for broken links.
prodBrokenLinks.prompt: Open [URL], click through every link, and report any 404 errors.

portfolioMonitoring.title: Portfolio Monitoring
portfolioMonitoring.description: Watch stock prices, and alert on drops and spikes.
portfolioMonitoring.prompt: Monitor my stock portfolio on [broker site], alert on price drops and spikes.

jobApplicationAutomation.title: Job Application Automation
jobApplicationAutomation.description: Filter jobs and submit applications with saved profiles.
jobApplicationAutomation.prompt: Find job listings from Indeed for [query], sort by salary, and apply to the top 5 using my profile.

eventCalendarBuilder.title: Event Calendar Builder
eventCalendarBuilder.description: Select top events and add them to the calendar.
eventCalendarBuilder.prompt: Scrape event listings from Eventbrite, filter by location, and add top 5 to my calendar.
